channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Agent

item.title: CVE-2023-4688|2023-08-31T20:26:56.338Z -- acronis -- acronis%20agent
item.description: Sensitive information leak through log files. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 35433.

item.title: CVE-2023-41751|2023-08-31T20:18:30.546Z -- acronis -- acronis%20agent
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to improper token expiration validation. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Windows) before build 32047.

item.title: CVE-2023-41750|2023-08-31T20:18:09.205Z -- acronis -- acronis%20agent
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to missing authorization. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 32047.

item.title: CVE-2023-41742|2023-08-31T14:27:28.948Z -- acronis -- acronis%20agent
item.description: Excessive attack surface due to binding to an unrestricted IP address. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 30430, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 35979.

item.description: Local privilege escalation due to unrestricted loading of unsigned libraries. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (macOS) before build 30600, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (macOS) before build 35979.
